alert.note: Alert for Clay; Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Henry, northeastern Houston, southwestern Clay and northwestern Early Counties through 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/... At 542 PM EDT/442 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Fort Gaines, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Headland, Webb, Columbia, Kinsey, Haleburg, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Barnes, Tumbleton, Hardwickburg, Zetto, Sigma, Grandberry Crossroads, Pearce, Hayes, Barber, Pleasant Plains and Miller. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
